EmailTemplate.name: Count of license
EmailTemplate.subject: System generated alert: You have consumed {!License_Alert__c.Consumed_in_percentage__c}% of your {!License_Alert__c.Name} in Salesforce {!Organization.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello Ops team This is the system generated notification for Salesforce licenses Consumption. This alert is related to License type : {!License_Alert__c.Name} Total Available {!License_Alert__c.Name}: {!License_Alert__c.00N260000011dbM} Total Consumed till date : {!License_Alert__c.Consumed__c} Percentage Consumed : {!License_Alert__c.Consumed_in_percentage__c} (%) This alert is generated from Salesforce {!Organization.Name} Regards Salesforce Admin
